abstract: J. C. Flowers, the private equity firm, on Friday unveiled a 1.1 billion euros ($1.7 billion) offer for a stake in German subprime-hit investment bank Hypo Real Estate.
lead_paragraph: J. C. Flowers, the private equity firm, on Friday unveiled a 1.1 billion euros ($1.7 billion) offer for a stake in German subprime-hit investment bank Hypo Real Estate.

headline.main: J. C. Flowers Bids for Stake in Germany’s Hypo
